tool_description: Predicts RF coverage areas and signal strength levels for cellular sites using terrain data and propagation modeling.

resolution_m.description: Spatial resolution for coverage grid in meters

min_signal_dbm.description: Minimum usable signal threshold in dBm

error_messages: Invalid frequency range: Frequency must be within 400-6000 MHz for cellular applications.
Power level out of range: Transmit power must be between -30 and +60 dBm.
Prediction radius too large: Maximum radius is 50 km for accurate modeling.
Invalid resolution: Spatial resolution must be between 10-1000 meters.
Unsupported antenna pattern: Use omnidirectional, sectoral, or directional patterns.
usage: Specify site_ids, frequency, and power parameters along with prediction settings. Returns coverage maps and statistics.

coverage_area_km2.description: Total coverage area in square kilometers per site

population_covered.description: Estimated population within coverage area per site

signal_strength_contours.description: Signal level contour boundaries for each site
